Our tradition is what makes us what we are, our cultural practices made us unique. We believe our culture should be preserved and not altered in any way and beliefs should be passed to younger generations. We can do this through digital arts because we all know that art is in expression or application of human creative skills and imagination. Most times, it is usually expressed in visual forms such as painting, sculpture and many more. And these artworks are to be appreciated for their beauty or emotional power which can be used to tell stories.

The Community

Lion of africa brings the embodiment of African culture to the NFT market. African culture has been represented in various forms over the years and it has played an important part of the worldwide trends. From century to century it has evolved and now, our time. Our characters are africans who evolve in a big universe and who have been digitalized by our artists to give them life in the Metaverse.

By joining the community, you may be making the best investment of your life. Be part of this new era where cultural heritage is more harmonious than ever!
